articles.description: As England prepare for Sunday's Euro 2024 last-16 tie, BBC Sport pundits debate how they have performed and what needs to happen next.
articles.title: Euro 2024: BBC Sport pundits have their say on England and what should happen next

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Georgia vs Portugal in the UEFA Euro 2024
articles.title: Georgia vs Portugal: UEFA Euro 2024

articles.description: BBC Sport takes a look at England's possible routes through the Euro 2024 knockout stage after the Three Lions top Group C.
articles.title: Euro 2024: What are England's routes through the knockouts?

articles.description: In 2021, La Palma's volcanos erupted, issuing tonnes of molten rock and a reminder of the perilious nature of the island's premier running race.
articles.title: Transvulcania - the race on the rim of La Palma's volcanos

articles.description: Belgium clinched their spot in the last 16 of Euro 2024 but there were few celebrations and no adulation from supporters at full-time in Stuttgart.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Fan jeers, late arrival & targeted by lasers but Belgium progress to last 16

articles.description: Katie Boulter's impressive form on grass continues with a confident win over Jelena Ostapenko to reach the quarter-finals at Eastbourne.
articles.title: Eastbourne 2024: Katie Boulter Boulter outplays Jelena Ostapenko to reach quarter-finals

articles.description: Find out groups & schedule information for the UEFA Euro 2024
articles.title: UEFA Euro 2024 - Groups & Schedule

articles.description: Cenk Tosun scores a stoppage-time winner as Turkey beat the Czech Republic in their final group game to secure a last-16 tie against Austria.
articles.title: Turkey 2-1 Czech Republic: Cenk Tosun scores stoppage-time winner for Turkey

articles.description: British schoolgirl Hannah Klugman is one win away from reaching the main Wimbledon draw after a second victory in qualifying.
articles.title: Hannah Klugman: British 15-year-old one win away from reaching main Wimbledon draw

articles.description: Coach Matthew Mott says it is time for England to be "frontrunners" at the T20 World Cup and "throw the first punch" in Thursday's semi-final against India.
articles.title: T20 World Cup semi-finals: England want to 'throw first punch' against India
